page.title: 05Farming _ Combine Harvester
page.content: On Friday the 10th of May some of us went to survey land and in my group were Samantha, Emma, Kevin and Edward.We had to interview a farmer.After that we had a look at the combine harvester. It was a Massey Ferguson. When we had a good look round we went in the control cab and the farmer said he could teach our teacher to drive it in about five minutes. I found out that my grand_dad worked for the company that sprayed his crops. The combine's colour was reddish brown and we heard the engine start up. We saw a rat run across the yard. The combine had a big red cutter at the front and a tube at the side. When the tractor comes along the tube is swung round and the corn comes out and there is a big tank in the middle which stores the grain.
